activities: FlyData Inc. is a cloud-based, data integration company that loads and/or synchronizes clients' data into Amazon Redshift, Amazon Web Services' data warehousing service. Although we do not look into a client's data, we migrate the data for them, thus requiring a Safe Harbor certification for possible EU/Switzerland customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, Client, Customer, Visitor, Manually Processed Data
